posts.post_content:
Hey guys,

I'm trying to move a few cool T206's to help fund some personal things I would like to accomplish.

I received this card from one of my best friends here on 54 and it's probably best to accept offers since I can't remember exactly what I paid for it. I usually document my purchase prices but this one slipped through the cracks.

The reverse has a very cool detailed GHOST.

Please bump.

Here's the front

EDIT: my iPhone is having difficulty uploading front.
It is a PSA4 of George Perring.

Can you guys tell I'm not having a very good day.

Bump me if interested and I will send pics to your email.

Thanks...Craig

GONE, SOLD!!!

Thanks to all that inquired, the card went to a very good home. Take care of Mr. Perring, he is very tired.

Craig
Nice card Craig, congrats to the new owner.
